name: Vishnuvas: Origins
description:
Vishnuvas : Origins is a story of events that happened in the town of Vishnuvas after an earthquake destroyed the whole town. This story revolves around an archaeologist Anish who wants to find out the reason behind his dreams where he watches a place destroy due to earthquake . 

This game is made in only 15 days so expect some bugs and optimization issues. This game is made by an Indian developer, so for the first version, we will be sticking to Hindi Language (Voice Pack) for localization.

Do support if you want the next update 😂 

This game is free to play but those who want to help me financially so that I can release the next part asap can donate me through UPI

UPI ID:- rcrc0291@oksbi
